snippet: In Florida, President Obama continued his swing-state offensive against Mitt Romney’s tax-cut plans, deriding them as a boon to the rich at the expense of everyone else.
abstract: Pres Obama continues his swing-state offensive against Mitt Romney’s tax-cut plans, deriding them as a boon to the rich at the expense of everyone else.

byline.contributor: Peter Baker contributed reporting from Leesburg, Va.

lead_paragraph: In Florida, President Obama continued his swing-state offensive against Mitt Romney’s tax-cut plans, deriding them as a boon to the rich at the expense of everyone else.

headline.main: President Again Blasts Tax Proposal of Romney’s
headline.print_headline: President Again Blasts Tax Proposal Of Romney’s
